subclusters.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-associated DNA methylation changes at gene regulatory regions as causal drivers of aging and longevity interventions modulating these methylation patterns.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cell-Type Specific Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Develops epigenetic clocks at cell-type resolution, emphasizing intrinsic and extrinsic aging components and cell-type specific DNA methylation aging signatures.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes epigenetic aging mechanisms specifically in T cells, including chromatin changes driving immune senescence and subset-specific epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uses DNA methylation at CpG sites as biomarkers of biological age and introduces quantile regression to capture heterogeneity in epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Chromatin Stabilization Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory in Stem Cells
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on Polycomb protein Ezh2-mediated chromatin modifications maintaining stem cell function and preventing exhaustion as an epigenetic aging mechanism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic and Immune Regulation of Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links genetic regulation and immune system involvement to epigenetic age acceleration, highlighting druggable targets modulating epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA methylation clocks as conserved biomarkers of aging across species and links methylation changes to gene regulation and aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lifestyle-Modulated Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on exercise as a geroprotective intervention that modulates epigenetic aging via DNA methylation changes and organ-specific effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes global hypomethylation and site-specific hypermethylation as molecular clocks linking aging and cancer risk.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Environment-Modulated Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights influence of host systemic environment on epigenetic aging of transplanted cells, showing plasticity of epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes epigenetic clocks as DNA methylation-based biomarkers reflecting biological age and evolutionary aging mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lifestyle-Modulated Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on exercise-induced epigenetic remodeling in brain and other tissues, linking epigenetic modifications to aging and cognitive function.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Developmental Programming Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes early-life nutritional status inducing epigenetic programming that influences aging and disease susceptibility later in life.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Lifestyle-Modulated Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows lifestyle interventions like weight loss can attenuate DNA methylation aging, linking modifiable factors to epigenetic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links epigenetic age acceleration to immune cell profiles and inflammation, highlighting intrinsic and extrinsic epigenetic aging in immune system.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA methylation regulation of cognitive aging and neuronal gene expression, emphasizing reversible methylation dynamics.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Environmental and Genetic Interaction Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Uses twin studies to dissect genetic and environmental contributions to epigenetic aging, emphasizing epigenetic drift and environmental impact.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes generations of epigenetic clocks predicting chronological and biological age and their temporal relationship with physiological aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows DNA methylation changes correlate with species longevity and link developmental gene regulation to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA methylation regulation of learning and memory decline in aging brain, highlighting dynamic methylation in neurons.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes epigenetic dysregulation in immune cells causing immunosenescence and inflammaging, emphasizing reversibility and therapeutic potential.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details principles of DNA methylation changes as biomarkers of aging, including programmed and stochastic methylation and epigenetic memory.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links epigenetic age acceleration causally to age-related eye diseases, highlighting systemic epigenetic aging effects on immune-related pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-related DNA methylation changes in immune cells contributing to immune senescence and altered gene expression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Methylation-Driven Epigenetic Aging Clock Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes cell division-associated progression of DNA methylation age in fibroblasts and modulation by oxygen levels, linking intrinsic cellular aging to epigenetic clock.
